body: #144 drop celery-3.1 and old Django versions

#132 Django-4.0
Django-rest-framework-3.13
#112 Celery-5.1 support
#106 Django-3.2 support
#85 python-3.9 support
#78 support Celery-5.0

#73 pass options to AsyncResult.get from Client.get_result
#74 Django-3.1 support
#72 Support Celery==4.4.4
#71 setup.py python compatibility
#70 fix PyPI release issues
Rename package for PyPI publication
#70 Fix publishing to pypi

#62 rename async kwarg to nowait
#68 add python3.6+ to build matrix

This release maintains backward compatibility with 1.5 and should support actual python versions. Release 3.0. will drop support for python2.7 and unsupported versions of Django, django-rest-framework and python3

name: Expire for tasks
body: Drops expired tasks from queue.

name: Caller identity in task headers
body: Provide information about caller on server side

name: Client-server exception support
body:
- ability to handle server side exception
- m2m manipulations (add/delete)
- forcing identity field by client
- indirect addressing of resource
- some docs

name: Some improvements
body:
- m2m manipulations (add/delete)
- forcing identity field by client
- some docs

name: Stable release with previous RC features
Ability to use related fields as PK
Fix partial for create
body: - Partial is valid only for update

name: More features for pipeline
body:
- `translate` task - adjust output of previous task to input next one;
- `result` task - restore result of any previous task in pipeline and send it to input of next one;

name: Added pipeline support
body: - Ability to join several tasks in only one request.

name: Special for my best friends! :)
body: Changed default values for filters_Q and exclude_Q

name: Improve filtering
body:
- `filter` got support for Django Q-objects
  - Enabled by setting for client CELERY_TASK_SERIALIZER = 'x-rpc-json'. Both client and server must have celery_rpc>=0.17.
- `fllter` now can exclude models by lookups and Q-objects. Filters and excludes can be mixed with fun.

name: Improve filtering
body:
- `filter` got support for Django Q-objects
- `fllter` now can not only filtering but also exclude models (Q-objects supports too).

name: More flexible
body: - Now can change base class for tasks

name: Slightly improve convenience for friends
body: - Use is_valid() instead of 'not errors'

name: Client does not require Django anymore
Fix interference between client & server tasks
body: https://github.com/ttyS15/django-celery-rpc/pull/14

name: Fix issue with create instances while update called
body: #12 Fixed

name: Fix issues with high priority requests
More power ...
Partial model update
body:
- Use partial update for DRF serializers
- Fix bug in `call` method with odd `kwargs`

name: Expand model methods
body:
- New model methods: `create`, `delete` and `update_or_create`.
- Ability to create group of RPC tasks.

name: First steps
body:
Implemented base functions:
- Django model filter & update
- call function
- useful client
